snippet: Mariachi band or break-dance crew? City Room wants to know which subway performers you give money to, and why.
abstract: Mariachi band or break-dance crew? City Room wants to know which subway performers you give money to, and why.
lead_paragraph: City Room poll question: Which subway performers do you give money to, and which do you silently hiss daggers at, and why? Norteño band or break-dance crew? Lone accordion player or miniature gospel choir? And notwithstanding the Metropolitan Transportation Authority's bans on performing and soliciting donations on a train, do you generally welcome such intrusions on your trip, or do they make you want to move to Montana?

headline.main: Do You Tip the Subway Accordionist?
